title: Blue-Black - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Modern Day   Short Story   Terminal Illness
author: Tougenrai Keika   東源雷頸華
description:
Shouri, a typical country boy meets a boy on the harbor one day who looks as beautiful as a doll. The boy calls himself Kazusa, and Shouri is gradually drawn to him by the boy’s mysterious charm.

A refreshing whilst heart-wrenching story set in a seaside town.>
